str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Incense. From thumiao; an aroma, i.e. Fragrant powder burnt in religious service; by implication, the burning itself.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A multitude, crowd, great number, assemblage. From pletho; a fulness, i.e. A large number, throng, populace.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
Without, outside. Adverb from ek; out(-side, of doors), literally or figuratively.
